name: com.davidswanston.scriptable-event-channels
description:
Use scriptable objets as event channels to decouple your code. 

Based on Unity's 'Create modular game architecture in Unity with ScriptableObjects' 

ebook: https://unity.com/resources/create-modular-game-architecture-with-scriptable-objects-ebook?ungated=true&isGated=false and 
demo project: https://github.com/UnityTechnologies/PaddleGameSO/tree/main.
